original_text: And he directed the people to sit down on the grass. Taking the five loaves and the two fish and looking up to heaven, he gave thanks and broke the loaves. Then he gave them to the disciples, and the disciples gave them to the people.
korean_text: 무리를 명하여 잔디 위에 앉히시고 떡 다섯 개와 물고기 두 마리를 가지사 하늘을 우러러 축사하시고 떡을 떼어 제자들에게 주시매 제자들이 무리에게 주니

sentences.original_text: And he directed the people to sit down on the grass.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들에게 풀 위에 앉도록 지시했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Taking the five loaves and the two fish
sentences.korean_translation: 떡 다섯 개와 물고기 두 마리를 들고

sentences.original_text: Then he gave them to the disciples,
and the disciples gave them to the people.
